{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-16T18:56:22.000Z", "description": "

Senior Machine Learning/AI Engineer


Experience:- 7-10 Years

Location :- Bangalore

Salary :- 30-35 Lacs

Immediate Joiner or those who are serving Notice Period can apply.


Overview (With Technical Skills):


SAS Platform (Programming/ Developer)

\u25aa Have 7+ years of professional experience in machine learning or quantitative analysis or have a Ph.D. in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or Physics.

\u25aa Have excellent programming and algorithmic skills.

\u25aa Are proficient with Python and experience with data processing tools (e.g., SciPy, NumPy, Pandas, PyTorch, and Apache Spark).

\u25aa Have an in-depth understanding of supervised and unsupervised machine learning algorithms. Knowledge of engineering causal models and convolutional neural networks a big plus.

\u25aa Have proven track record of deploying learning algorithms in a production system.

\u25aa Have demonstrated end-to-end ownership of projects

\u25aa Have stellar listening and explanation skills


Key Responsibilities:

\u27a2 Deliver state-of-the-art, causal algorithms to production for optimizing consumer product metrics

\u27a2 Build and maintain the infrastructure for data and model management

\u27a2 Work closely with the Turing design and engineering teams for machine learning-adjacent components, such as visualization, ad-hoc data analysis, and data processing

\u27a2 Give talks, write blog posts, and produce peer-reviewed publications

\u27a2 Define and lead the development of longer-term Turing Platform capabilities.


Compensation & Perks:

\u2022 Remote-friendly work environment

\u2022 Collaborative culture

\u2022 Mentorship from machine learning pioneers

\u2022 Competitive salary with generous equity. You get to join the company at the most advantageous stage

\u2022 Directly impact the growth of the company

\u2022 Play a significant role in strategizing the product roadmap

\u2022 Reimbursement of home-office setup
